nodes.text: Dark Times—A Spark Remains 4 is the thirty-first issue of the Star Wars: Dark Times comic series and the fourth in the A Spark Remains story arc.

Darth Vader is on the trail of one Jedi—little does he know that even more Jedi are aware of his search and his impending arrival on their planet. The Jedi and their friends are waiting with a trap to end Vader for good.
But this is a Dark lord of the Sith they will be battling—and nothing is certain! A few of the last surviving Jedi plant a trap for Darth Vader!
